column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=We have to stop listening to the lies of our politicians and governments and we definitely have to stop letting them run more and more of our lives .
#Text=We have to start analyzing problems to find out what 's really causing them , and then working cooperatively to remove the causes .
#Text=What should be the first order of business in the 39th Legislative Assembly ?
#Text=The top priority should be to end government coercion and only allow force to be used to defend a person or their property .
#Text=Those who use threats or force offensively should be made to compensate their victim(s) for the harm done to them .
#Text=Are the property taxes in your riding at a fair level for the amount of services received in the municipality ?
#Text=There is no such think as a fair tax level .
#Text=All taxes are theft .
#Text=If a government agency offers a service they should charge for that service the same as any private service provider would .
#Text=In addition , anyone who wished to offer a service in competition with the government agency should be allowed to do so .
#Text=How can the province lead the way in stimulating job creation ?
#Text=To stimulate job creation , the provincial government should get out of the way and allow the private sector to create jobs without government interference .
#Text=What are your views on the mixed member proportional representation ( MMP ) referendum ?
#Text=I 'm for MMP voting as it decreases the chances of a single party ( and hence a few individuals ) from having free reign in our government .
#Text=However , I feel MMP should be implemented with far fewer seats .
#Text=Increasing the number of seats is part of the major political parties ' plan to make this alternative unpopular .
#Text=If they oppose it so strongly , it 's obviously a very good idea , so I 'm all for it .
#Text=What role , if any , does “ new media ” play in your campaign , and the campaign of your party ?
#Text=( websites , blogs , Facebook , YouTube videos , etc ) Do you view it as beneficial , or a challenge ?
#Text=The more alternatives available the better .

#Text=Our primary objective in this campaign is to let voters know that : there is an alternative to ever more government , higher taxes and more regulations controlling their lives , and that this alternative will make all aspects of their lives better as it will bring more prosperity , less crime , a cleaner environment and all the other good things most people want .
#Text=Of the decisions made by Ontario 's 38th Legislative Assembly , which was the most beneficial to your this electoral district ?
#Text=To the province as a whole ?
#Text=Which was least beneficial , or even harmful , to your this riding ?
#Text=To the province as a whole ?
#Text=No government decisions are beneficial .
#Text=Most are a costly nuisance .
#Text=The rest are harmful .
